__e: The girl of his dreams married another.
I married a rich, old man.
She marries another man, and she's lost to you forever.
When I married your father, and I had you two, I had to put my dreams on hold.
He had money and he had a good job, so my sense has always been that she married him early and she married him because he was the kind of person she was supposed to marry.
Look, if I was marrying the wrong person and the right person was out there and knew it,
Tied the knot nine years ago this January. And fathered a little feller one year later. Liar!
I wouldn't marry you if you were young, which you can't be, if you were honest, which you never were and if you were about to die tomorrow which is too much to hope for.
And because she had no news from him, she remarried.
"OK, paint yourself with three women and hang it in every corner."
If my father didn't want me, why did he marry you?
Quit his second year to get married... like I wanted us to do.
I couldn't work so I married her.
Susan, when I married you the first time, I did it to get into your pants.
I married her and I love her.
The third married a slut, not eating them/her/it anything for me does.
But then I came here, and I did well, and I didn't want to give it up, so I told him no... and he married someone else.
